name: Nacho Mac and Cheese Casserole with Taco Tempeh 'meat'. Vegan Recipe
description: Nacho Mac and Cheese Casserole with Taco Tempeh 'meat'. Vegan Recipe. Can be made soy-free with cooked chickpeas or beans instead of Tempeh. Serves 3 to 4
recipeIngredient: 1-2  roasted/canned pimiento  (or roasted 1/2 red bell pepper)
2 teaspoons onion flakes  (or a 1 teaspoon onion powder)
Or you can use salt, tomato paste and taco seasoning mix to add to tempeh+water
1/2 cup Salsa of choice (or chopped roma tomatoes, red onion, cilantro, salt and lime juice)

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, add crumbled tempeh, water and rest of the ingredients. Mix and cook covered on low-medium heat for 25 minutes or until dry. Stir twice in between. You can marinate the tempeh in the wet before cooking if you like for a deeper flavor.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, add crumbled tempeh, water and rest of the ingredients. Mix and cook covered on low-medium heat for 25 minutes or until dry. Stir twice in between. You can marinate the tempeh in the wet before cooking if you like for a deeper flavor.

recipeInstructions.text: Boil the water for the pasta and cook until al dente.
recipeInstructions.name: Boil the water for the pasta and cook until al dente.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the nacho cheese sauce ingredients to a blender and blend until smooth. Mix the sauce into drained hot Macaroni pasta.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the nacho cheese sauce ingredients to a blender and blend until smooth. Mix the sauce into drained hot Macaroni pasta.

recipeInstructions.text: Top with Salsa. (Or top the chips with salsa later).
recipeInstructions.name: Top with Salsa. (Or top the chips with salsa later).

recipeInstructions.text: Add the remaining Mac and Cheese.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the remaining Mac and Cheese.

recipeInstructions.text: Top with Chips, Jalapenos and cheese shreds.
recipeInstructions.name: Top with Chips, Jalapenos and cheese shreds.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at pre-heated 370 degrees F  / 190ºc for 25-30 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at pre-heated 370 degrees F  / 190ºc for 25-30 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool for a bit before serving.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool for a bit before serving.
